Class HttpConnPool

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.http.pool.ConnPool<org.apache.http.conn.routing.HttpRoute,HttpPoolEntry>, org.apache.http.pool.ConnPoolControl<org.apache.http.conn.routing.HttpRoute>

    public class HttpConnPool
extends org.apache.http.pool.AbstractConnPool<org.apache.http.conn.routing.HttpRoute,org.apache.http.conn.OperatedClientConnection,HttpPoolEntry>
    Implementation of AbstractConnPool to allow better connection validity management.

    3.2
